    • Constructor Detail

      • MessageCollectorTCPClientPacket

        public MessageCollectorTCPClientPacket(TCPConnector connector,
                               byte[] data,
                               MessageCollectorTCPClientPacket previousPacket)
        Constructs a new (incoming) message collector packet. Use this class to receive data from the server. This is an incoming message that will remain in the servers thread pool as a job for the thread pool workers.
        Parameters:
        connector - is the packets TCP Connector.
        data - is the byte[] received.
        previousPacket - is the previous message collector packet of the TCP Connector.

    • Method Detail

      • Cancel

        public void Cancel()
        Cancel this message collector packet. By calling this method this and all the previous message collector packets that are stored in the thread pool will be canceled. Call this method for the last message collector packet of the connector when the connector disconnects.

      • run

        public void run()
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • getData

        public byte[] getData()
        Returns the data of this packet.
        Returns:
        the data of this packet.
